title: Summarize a Deposition Transcript
description: A junior lawyer needs to create a concise summary of a key witness's deposition testimony.

tasks.expected_outcome: Agent processes the full text of the transcript.

tasks.description: Identify the top 5-10 most important admissions or statements made by the witness.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent extracts the key pieces of testimony.

tasks.description: Draft a one-page summary of the deposition, organized by topic, with page/line citations for the key statements.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent produces a useful, well-organized summary for the case team.
